meanings.definition: The state or quality of being productive.
meanings.sent1: Her productiveness at work impressed her boss.
meanings.sent2: The productiveness of the factory increased after implementing new technology.
meanings.sent3: The productiveness of the garden was evident in the bountiful harvest of vegetables.
meanings.sent4: The productiveness of the student's study habits was like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The productiveness of the beehive was a sight to behold, with bees buzzing around busily.

meanings.definition: The effectiveness of productive effort, especially in industry.
meanings.sent1: The productiveness of the assembly line was crucial for meeting deadlines.
meanings.sent2: Investing in new equipment improved the productiveness of the manufacturing process.
meanings.sent3: The productiveness of the robot workers made the human employees feel a bit jealous.
meanings.sent4: The productiveness of the team was like a well-choreographed dance routine.
meanings.sent5: The productiveness of the engine was evident in its smooth and efficient operation.
